snippet: A tech support scam, based partially in India, tells users their computer is infected with harmful software, and then offers to fix it for a price.
abstract: A tech support scam, based partially in India, tells users their computer is infected with harmful software, and then offers to fix it for a price.
lead_paragraph: The Federal Trade Commission recently announced a multinational crackdown on a tech support scam “that depended on a pitch that many people found completely believable — that Microsoft or another computer company knows what is on your personal computer,” Edward Wyatt wrote in The New York Times.

headline.main: Multinational Crackdown on Computer Con Artists
